message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. I know it's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, $120 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $140?  I'm confident you'll find this price fair, considering the value of the product.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. However, I am still unable to meet at $140. Would you consider $130?
